description.ko: 험준한 산맥의 지형부터 바다와 구름의 유동적인 움직임까지, 지구의 다양한 표면 패턴을 상세하게 탐구합니다.
description.en: A detailed exploration of the planet's diverse surface patterns, from the rugged terrain of mountain peaks to the fluid movements of the oceans and clouds.

prompt: Cinematic satellite photography of Earth's surface, high-resolution topographical details, vast mountain ranges, deep ocean trenches, swirling atmospheric cloud patterns, hyper-realistic textures, 8k resolution, realistic lighting and shadows, intricate natural formations
